japanese: 三玖、来たぞ。
translation: Miku, I'm here.

japanese:
うん。
お待たせしちゃってごめん。
もうすぐ着替え終わるから、そこで待ってて。
translation:
Okay.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
I'll finish changing soon, so please wait there.

japanese: あいつら来てるみたいだぞ。
translation: It looks like they've arrived.

japanese:
ったく、なに企んでんだか。
高校生の頃から変わっちゃいねぇ。
問題児だらけだ。
translation:
Good grief, what are they plotting?
They haven't changed since high school.
They're all troublemakers.

japanese: それって私も含めて？
translation: Is that including me?

japanese:
当然だろ。
一番とは言わないが、しっかり問題児だったぞ。
translation:
Of course.
I won't say you were the worst,
but you were definitely a troublemaker.

japanese: （そういや今朝も夢を見たっけな）
translation: (Come to think of it, I had a dream this morning.)

japanese:
（あの日を何度、夢に見るんだろう。
　そんな深く脳裏に刻まれるほどの――）
translation:
(How many times have I dreamt of that day?
 It's etched so deeply in my mind.)

japanese: （とんでもない悪夢だ）
translation: (It was such a terrible nightmare.)

japanese: お待たせ。
translation: Sorry to keep you waiting.

japanese: まだ俺は夢を見ているのか？
translation: Am I still dreaming?

japanese: 五つ子ゲーム、ファイナルだよ。
translation: It's the final quintuplets game.

japanese: 愛があれば見分けられるよね。
translation: If you truly love me, you can tell me apart, right?

japanese:
皆様、本日はご多忙の中、
僕たちの結婚披露宴にお集まりいただきまして
誠にありがとうございます。
translation:
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking time
out of your busy schedules
to attend our wedding reception today.

japanese:
これまでお世話になった方々の前で
ようやく挙式を執り行えたことを、
大変嬉しく思います。
translation:
I am very happy to finally have our wedding ceremony
in front of everyone who has supported us so far.

japanese: 本当に……長い道のりでした。
translation: It...really has been a long road.

japanese: 五つ子ゲームって……。
translation: The quintuplets game...

japanese: 馬鹿か！　ってか三玖以外の４人！
translation: What a joke! Except for Miku, you other four!

japanese:
こんなお遊びでウェディングドレス着てんじゃねぇ！
なにしてるかわかってんのか！
translation:
What are you doing, wearing wedding dresses
for this kind of game?
Do you even know what you're doing?

japanese: 確かにちょっと複雑だけど……。
translation: Sure, it's a bit complicated...

japanese: 思いついちゃったから。
translation: But we just thought of it, you know...

japanese: それにお遊びじゃない。
translation: And it's not just for fun.

japanese: これでも花嫁の親族だから。
translation: We're also relatives of the bride.

japanese: っていうのは嘘で私が花嫁本人だよ。
translation:
Well, that's a lie.
I'm the bride.

japanese: 違うよ、私。
translation: No. It's me.

japanese: 花嫁といえば私。
translation: I'm the bride!

japanese: 風太郎ならわかるよね？
translation: You can tell, right, Futaro?

japanese:
ったく、馬鹿野郎……。
少しは分別のつく大人になったかと思えば。
translation:
Geez, you idiots...
Just when I thought
you'd become somewhat sensible adults.

japanese:
相変わらずのようで安心した。
俺を舐めんな。
translation:
It's a relief you still haven't changed at all.
Don't underestimate me.

japanese: お前だ。
translation: It's you.

japanese:
宴もたけなわとなりましたが
そろそろお時間のようです。
translation:
It seems the party is at its peak,
but it looks like it's time to wrap things up.

japanese:
最後に新婦様から親御様へ
感謝を込めたメッセージです。
translation:
Lastly, a message of gratitude
from the bride to her parents.

japanese:
お父さん、そして天国のお母さん。
私が今日、この日を迎えられたのは
２人がいたからに他なりません。
translation:
To my father, and my mother in heaven,
I would not be here today
if it weren't for the both of you.

japanese:
お母さんは私が小さな頃に
いなくなってしまいましたが、
その教えと愛はいつまでも私の中に残っています。
translation:
Although my mother left me when I was young,
her teachings and her love will always stay with me.

japanese: そして、お父さん。
translation: And, Dad.

japanese:
突然の出来事に、私は戸惑ってばかりでした。
お父さんをたくさん心配させてしまったことでしょう。
translation:
I was simply bewildered by the sudden turn
of events, and I must have caused you a lot of worry.

japanese:
けれど、いまは、お父さんが
どれだけ私たちを愛してくれているのか、
よくわかります。
translation:
However, now I truly understand how much you love us,
Dad.

japanese:
ずっと、静かに優しく見守ってくれて、
ありがとうございます。
translation:
Thank you for silently and gently
watching over us all this time.

japanese: そして、姉妹にも、改めて感謝します。
translation:
I also want to express my gratitude
to my sisters once again.

japanese: えっ、私？
translation: Huh, me?

japanese: お前が一花だ。
translation: You're Ichika.

japanese:
一花は、頼もしいお姉さんです。
いつも私たちを優しくまとめて、
引っ張っていってくれました。
translation:
Ichika is a reliable older sister.
She always gathers us together gently,
and leads the way.

japanese:
女優という夢を叶えてキラキラと輝いている姿は、
私にとって自慢の姉で、憧れでもあります。
translation:
Her shining figure,
realizing her dream as an actress,
is something I take pride in and also admire.

japanese:
なーんだ。
お姉さん、びっくりしたよ。
translation: Oh, is that so? You surprised me.

japanese: 正解。
translation: You are correct.

japanese:
懐かしいな。
お前にはずいぶん手を焼かされた。
translation:
It brings back memories.
You gave me quite a hard time, you know.

japanese:
クールビューティーなんて
世間は謳ってるが俺はだまされねぇ。
translation:
People call you a cool beauty,
but I'm not fooled.

japanese: 自堕落、愚鈍、惰眠を貪る、怠惰だ。
translation:
You're indulgent, dull,
lazy, and you sleep too much.

japanese: そ、そこまで言わなくても……。
translation: Y-you didn't have to go THAT far...

japanese:
それでも強くあろうとする姿が俺には眩しく見えた。
大した長女だよ、お前は。
translation:
But even so,
your determination to be strong appeared dazzling to me.
You're an amazing big sister.

japanese: なんだよー、急にどうした？
translation: What the? Why now, all of a sudden?

japanese:
ふん、せっかくだ。
俺も言いたいことを言わせてもらう。
translation:
Hmph. While I've got the chance,
just let me say what I want to say.

japanese: 次はお前だ、二乃。
translation: You're up next, Nino.

japanese:
次女の二乃は、私の恩人でもあります。
私が夢を叶えるために、本当に、
たくさん力を貸してくれました。
translation:
Nino, the second oldest quintuplet, is also a 
benefactor of mine. She's truly supported me a lot
to help me realize my dreams.

japanese: いまの私があるのは、二乃のおかげです。
translation: I owe it to you, Nino, for who I am today.

japanese:
これから、貸してもらった分、
たくさん力になっていくつもりです。
translation:
From now on, I intend to repay the favor
by becoming a source of strength for you, as well.

japanese: そうよ、正解！
translation: That's right!

japanese:
はいはい、よかったわね。
次どうぞ！
translation:
Good job, you got it, you got it!
Next!

japanese: なんでこんな時に……。
translation: Why, at a time like this...

japanese: 三玖だけ当てればいいのよ。
translation: You just need to identify Miku.

japanese:
お前の強さは、その人一倍の弱さの裏返しだ。
厳しさも、それだけ大きな愛情があるから
なんだろうな。
translation:
Your strength is in your compassion for others. 
Even though you act tough, I suppose it's because 
you have so much love to give.

japanese:
あの頃の俺は、
その答えを見つけることができなかった。
すまん。
translation:
I couldn't find the answer at that time.
I'm sorry.

japanese:
いいわよ……。
私は……後悔してない……。
translation:
It's okay...
I...have no regrets...

japanese: そうか。
translation: I see.

japanese: 四葉。
translation: Yotsuba.

japanese: ……はい。
translation: Yup.

japanese:
四葉は、妹だけど妹ではないような、
でもお姉さんでもない、不思議な存在です。
translation:
You're my sister, but not just a sister.
You're a special person in my life,
neither a little sister nor an older sister.

japanese:
だからこそ、
色々なことを相談できたのかもしれません。
translation:
That's why, perhaps,
I was able to discuss various things with you.

japanese:
お前の人助けはいまも続いてる。
それは、お前がそうありたいと望んでのことだよな。
translation:
You keep helping people, even now.
That's because it's what you want to do, right?

japanese:
勝手を言って悪いが、
これからもそういう四葉でいてほしい。
お前に助けられたひとりとして、願っている。
translation:
I'm sorry for being presumptuous, but I hope you
continue to be that kind of person in the future.
As someone who was helped by you, I wish for that.

japanese:
もちろんです。
自分で決めて進んできた道ですから。
translation:
Of course.
It's the path I've chosen and walked on my own.

japanese:
勝手なんて言わないでください。
認めてもらえてるって、嬉しいです。
translation:
Please don't say that it's presumptuous of you.
I'm happy to know that I'm being acknowledged.

japanese: ああ。
translation: Yeah.

japanese: 残るはお前だ、五月。
translation: And finally, Itsuki.
...Huh?

japanese: フータロー、本気？
translation: Futaro, are you serious?

japanese:
五月は、末っ子だけど、私たちの中では
一番しっかりしているかもしれません。
translation:
Itsuki is the youngest among us,
but she might be the most reliable.

japanese:
時には、落ち込んでいる私を
包み込んでくれるように感じることもありました。
translation:
At times, I felt like she would 
give me a big hug
whenever I was feeling down.

japanese:
でも、どこか不器用なところもあって、
やっぱりすごく可愛い妹なんですよ。
translation:
But, she also has a somewhat clumsy side,
and she's still an incredibly adorable little sister.

japanese: なーんて！
translation: Just kidding!

japanese:
じゃーん、五月でした！
どう？　うまくなったでしょ？
translation:
It was me, Itsuki!
How was that? Did I do well?

japanese: この……焦らせやがって……。
translation: You...teasing me like this...

japanese: この際だから言わせてもらうが！
translation: I have this chance! I'll say it now.

japanese:
お前に会ってからだ！
俺の人生が狂い始めたのは！
translation:
You're the reason my life went off track!
It was meeting you!

japanese: 諸悪の根源！　妖怪カレー食い女！
translation: The root of all evil! The curry-loving yokai woman!

japanese:
……っ！
わ、私だって！
translation: W-well, I never!

japanese:
あなたと会うまで、こんなにデリカシーのない人が
いるなんて想像もつきませんでした！
あたまでっかち！　天然キス魔！
translation:
Before I met you, I could have never imagined
that there could be someone so lacking in
delicacy! You smart-ass! Compulsive kisser airhead!

japanese:
やっぱり、あなたとは一生
馬が合いそうにありません！
translation: I just don't think we'll ever get along, you and I!

japanese: 五月……昔の口調に戻ってる。
translation: Itsuki's...using her old way of speaking again.

japanese: 仕方ないって、フータロー君が相手だし。
translation: Well, it's to be expected with Futaro around.

japanese: はぁ……ったく……。
translation: *sigh* Geez...

japanese:
で、余ったお前が三玖な。
はい全問正解。
translation:
And, the last one is you, Nino.
Yep. I got a perfect score.

japanese:
ふふっ。
満点だね、さすが。
translation:
Teehee.
It is a perfect score. Of course you'd get that.

japanese:
姉妹のみんながいなかったら、
私の人生はまったく別のものになっていたでしょう。
translation:
If my sisters weren't here,
my life would have been completely different.

japanese:
五つ子だということに悩んだ時もありました。
でも、その何倍、何百倍も、楽しい出来事が
思い出されます。
translation:
There were times when I struggled with
being a quintuplet. But for every moment of doubt,
there are hundreds of joyful memories that come to mind.

japanese:
これだけ長く付き合ってりゃ嫌でも覚える。
俺は家庭教師だったが、お前たちからも
多くのことを教わった。
translation:
I've been with you for so long that I can't help
but have learned from you too. I may have been a tutor,
but I've learned a lot from you.

japanese:
私は、みんなと五つ子の姉妹として
生まれることができて幸せでした。
translation:
I feel really blessed to have been born as a sister
to all of you quintuplets.

japanese:
お前たち五つ子に出会えたこと。
数少ない俺の自慢だ。
translation: Meeting you quintuplets is one of my proudest achievements.

japanese:
周りから見れば変わっているのかもしれません。
でも――
translation:
Perhaps we may seem different to others.
But%p-2;――

japanese: 私は、そんな家族が大好きです。
translation: I love my family, so much.
